&project;
Changelog
This release contains all of the changes up to and including those in Apache Tomcat 11.0.13 plus the additional changes listed below. (markt)
The minimum Java version has been updated to Java 21. (markt)
Add the Jakarta EE 12 XML schemas. (markt)
Add support for the new Servlet API method HttpServletResponse.sendEarlyHints(). (markt)
Remove JDBCAccessLogValve which provides limited functionality compared to what is expected from an AccessLog and was not implemented in a scalable way. (remm)
Added support for limiting the number of parameters in HTTP requests through the new ParameterLimitValve. The valve allows configurable URL-specific limits on the number of parameters. (dsoumis)
Remove the useAcceptRanges initialisation parameter for the default servlet. It is now effectively hard coded to true. (markt)
Change the default for the encodedSolidusHandling attribute of Context from decode to reject. (markt)
When searching the web application class loader for a resource or resources by name, align the behaviour with the JRE class loaders and always return null if the provided name starts with /. (markt)
Update the default value for the allowPostAsGet initialisation parameter of the Default servlet from true to false. This means a direct request (i.e. not a forward or an include) for a static resource using the POST method will be rejected by default. (markt)
Calls to HttpServletRequest.getContextPath() now return the canonical context path for the web application rather than the component of the request URI presented by the user agent that maps to the context path. (markt)
Change the default value of the archiveIndexStrategy attribute of the Resources element from simple to bloom to improve web application class loading performance. (markt)
Remove regular expression support for the configuration of internal and trusted proxies for the RemoteIpFilter and RemoteIpValve. (markt)
Remove the RemoteAddrFilter and RemoteAddrValve. (markt)
Change the default for the digestInRfc3112Order attribute of MessageDigestCredentialHandler from false to true. (markt)
When generating the class path in the Loader, re-order the check on individual class path components to avoid a potential NullPointerException. Identified by Coverity Scan. (markt)
Change the default value of the cookiesWithoutEquals attribute of the Rfc6265CookieProcessor from name to ignore. (markt)
Remove default password value (was changeit) for the certificateKeystorePassword attribute of a certificate. (remm)
Remove NIO2 connector. (remm)
Add specific certificate selection code for TLS 1.3 supporting post quantum cryptography. Certificates defined with type MLDSA will be selected depending on the TLS client hello. (remm)
Add groups attribute on SSLHostConfig allowing to restrict which groups can be enabled on the SSL engine. (remm)
Graceful failure for OCSP on BoringSSL in the FFM code. (remm)
69866: Fix a memory leak when using a trust store with the OpenSSL provider. Pull request 912 by aogburn. (markt)
Add support for the new Elvis (:?) and Null coalescing (??) operators in Jakarta Expression language. (markt)
Extend the existing += operator in Jakarta Expression Language to support merging MapMap and SetSet and concatenating Lists. (markt)
The defaults for compilerSourceVM and compilerTargetVM have been updated to 21 to align with Java 21 being the minimum Java version required for Tomcat 12. (markt)
Refactor the performance optimisation for jakarta.servlet.jsp.el.ImportELResolver to use the new marker class, jakarta.el.ELResolver.StandaloneIdentifierMarker. (markt)
Extend the support for relational operators to include TemporalAccessor, Clock and Date. (markt)
Add support for coercion to java.time.Instant and java.util.Date. (markt)
69862: Avoid NPE unwrapping Servlet exception which would hide some exception details. Patch submitted by Eric Blanquer. (remm)
Correct a regression in 11.0.11 that broke some clustering configurations. (markt)
Update Tomcat's WebSocket support to version 2.3 of the Jakarta WebSocket API. (markt)
Implement the new HandshakeRequest method, getUserX509CertificateChain() that provides the client certificate chain, if present, during the WebSocket handshake. (markt)
Implement the clarification in WebSocket 2.3 that the method ClientEndpointConfig.Configurator.afterResponse() must be called after every WebSocket handshake regardless of whether the handshake is successful or not. (markt)
Implement the new HandshakeRequest methods that expose the client's preferred local and the local and remote host name, address and port information. (markt)
Update Derby to 10.17.1.0. (markt)
Update the internal fork of Apache Commons BCEL to 6.11.0. (markt)
Update to the Eclipse JDT compiler 4.37. (markt)
Update to Byte Buddy 1.17.8. (markt)
Update to Checkstyle 12.1.1. (markt)
Update to Jacoco 0.8.14. (markt)
Update to SpotBugs 4.9.8. (markt)
Update to JSign 7.4. (markt)
Update Maven Resolver Ant Tasks to 1.6.0. (rjung)
Improvements to Japanese translations provided by tak7iji. (markt)
Improvements to French translations. (remm)
